summary: Guards will no longer comment on your skills until you bring them up to level 75. Unlike previously when they commented after you brought your skills up to level 30.
descriptionHtml:
Guards will no longer comment on your skills until you bring them up to level 75. Unlike previously when they commented after you brought your skills up to level 30. 

Featured in PCgamer:
http://www.pcgamer.com/2012/02/08/the-best-steam-workshop-skyrim-mods/

Also available on the Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7626
author: Jokiros
